attributes.action: Ban French Air Traffic Controllers Strikes
attributes.additional_details:
Let's get David Cameron to unite European Governments and Force the French Government to make it illegal for French Air Traffic Controllers to Strike.
They do this every year and disrupt thousands of ordinary people every year. It's about time that striking by the French is made illegal punishable by jail sentence. Why should Joe public have to put up with this every year, right across Europe people's flights, holidays, business trips are disrupted by these people who have no scruples. BAN IT NOW SIGN THIS PETITION
